          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gravitacija med telesi</string>
            <string language="en">Gravity between objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft zwischen Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pesanteur entre les objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gravidade entre objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gravità fra gli oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητα μεταξύ των αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gravedad entre los objetos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gravitacija med telesi (4 lahka in 1 težko) in vpliv razdalje in mase na gravitacijsko silo.</string>
            <string language="en">Gravitation between bodies (4 lightweight and 1 heavyweight) and relation between distance, mass and gravity force.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacija</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacijska sila</string>
            <string language="en">gravity force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razdalja</string>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitation zwischen Körpern (4 kompakt und 1 
heavyweight) und Relation zwischen Abstand, Masse und 
Schwerkraftkraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction universelle entre les corps (4 légers
et 1 poids lourd) et la relation entre la distance, la masse et la 
force de pesanteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gravitação entre corpos (4 de pouco peso e 1 
heavyweight) e relação entre a distância, a massa e a força da 
gravidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gravitazione fra i corpi (4 leggeri e 1 
heavyweight) ed il rapporto fra la distanza, la massa e la forza di 
gravità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητα μεταξύ των οργανισμών (4 ελαφριά και 1 
βαρέων βαρών) και της σχέσης μεταξύ της απόστασης, της μάζας και
της δύναμης βαρύτητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gravitación entre los cuerpos (4 ligeros y 1 
heavyweight) y la relación entre la distancia, la masa y la fuerza de
la gravedad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraftkraft</string>
          </keyword>
